title: The maximum parking area that can be provided shall be decided by the Authority, as the case may be, on considering the location of such site and the parking requirement
clause_text: The maximum parking area that can be provided shall be decided by the Authority, as the case may be, on considering the location of such site and the parking requirement.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The maximum parking area that can be provided shall be decided by the Authority, as the case may be, on considering the location of such site and the parking requirement.
